text:
We are incredibly grateful to iSplash Swim School for their exceptional dedication and care in coaching children with autism. Coach Alfred, the head coach, brings a wealth of experience in handling children with ASD, and his team is nothing short of amazing.

Our child, Adiy Zafran, has been under the guidance of Coach Imran, who has shown tremendous patience, understanding, and skill in building Adiyâ€™s confidence in the water. When we started, Adiy was afraid to even step into the pool. But thanks to the nurturing environment and tailored coaching, he is now a confident swimmer who genuinely enjoys his time in the water.

iSplash Swim school not only teaches swimming but also helps build self-assurance and resilience in children with special needs. Their approach is thoughtful, inclusive, and inspiring. Thank you for the remarkable experienceâ€”we couldnâ€™t have asked for a better team to support Adiyâ€™s journey.

Enrolled my son when he was 4 to learn swimming, and I am glad I trusted Isplash with the experience. Now my son is 6 and he has gained so much confidence in the water. All the coaches in Isplash are very helpful, kind and friendly. My son really enjoyed his time under their coaching. Highly recommended for young parents who have first time anxiety sending their kids for swimming lessons!

My boy had started swimming under Coach Alfred at the age of 5 and he has been enjoying so much during the class.

Coach Alfred is so patient and he interacts so well with the children. Joining Isplash Swimming School not just allowing my boy to learn survival skills, but also fostering strong and new friendships along the way.

Would like to express my heartfelt appreciation for all the dedication, patience, and hard work Coach Alex has put into coaching my daughter. His guidance and encouragement have played a huge role in her progress. My girl (Lovelle) enjoyed every single lesson! Thank you so much Coach Alex! ðŸ˜Š

My girl had been with Coach Royce for 1.5 years and from zero knowledge, the young fine lady had gained so much confidence in water. Coach Royce is patient, friendly and he makes the class engaging. Coach Kenneth had been also patient with our request and nevertheless keeping parents reminded in event of no lessons. I would highly recommend isplash!
